entry.title: Python + AutoML Vision = Automated Document Analysis
entry.summary:
Description

"Python + AutoML Vision = Automated Document Analysis" by: Kim Nguyen and Shane Hathaway Googleâ€™s AutoML Vision service is a great new tool. A client of ours had a time intensive process for classifying and routing documents. Using AutoML and Python, we helped them prototype and deploy a machine learning model to reduce the frequency of errors and accelerate overall processing of thousands of documents a day. We will describe the solution and present lessons learned.

Recorded at the 2021 Python Web Conference (https://2021.pythonwebconf.com)
